text: In the View Results Tree visualizer, if you select a request and have the tab "Sampler Result" open, and click on Run, Clear, the tab's content is not cleared.
creator: jens_0@hotmail.com
jens_0@hotmail.com
text: For exmaple, stats.setText("") should be added to SamplerResultTab.clearData()...

creator: milamber@apache.org
text:
Thanks for your report and suggestion. Fixed.

Bug 50367 - Clear / Clear all in View results tree does not clear selected element
